encounter_info.gift_requirement: Win a tag battle with Brendan
Beat your rival and talk to the guy behind him in the same room
Buy for $500 from a guy in PC

found.obs: Aerodactyl's fossil is in Pewter's Museum back entrance, same as in vanilla Fire Red. A guy in the Mansion can restore it.

Omanyte and Kabuto's fossils are in Mt. Moon, same as in vanilla Fire Red. A guy in the Mansion can restore them

        The guy in Celadon's Mansion gives you the other choice that you didn't pick in Mt. Moon..

routes.pokemon: Cosmog (can be found in a Wonder Egg, though)
